mapper.select: SELECT C.club_id, C.club_name, C.club_introduce, to_char(C.club_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS club_date, C.club_membercount, C.club_location, C.club_masternickname, C.member_id, C.interest_id, I.interest_interest FROM club C JOIN interest I ON C.interest_id = I.interest_id WHERE C.club_id = #{param1}
SELECT clubpicture_newname FROM clubpicture WHERE club_id = #{param1}
SELECT club_introduce FROM club WHERE club_id = #{param1}
